name: Necrotic Breach
description:
It's up to you the player to restore power to broken terminals and use your trusty laser rifle to eliminate all threats in the containment zone.

The enemy is smart and will try everything to foil your plans including grouping up to create an ambush, stalking and even retreating to safer territory.

Thankfully you will have help as the system AI will relay how much motion is detected through the PA system.

Controls and Goals:

WASD movement and Horizonal axis for the mouse to aim, Shoot with left click and interact with F.

Find all computer terminals and eliminate all threats to proceed to the next area!
